subject: Steroids
lead_paragraph: Olympic track coach Trevor Graham pleaded not guilty to hindering a grand jury’s probe of performance-enhancing drugs in sports on Thursday, the same day Barry Bonds’s personal trainer was ordered back to prison.
snippet: Olympic track coach Trevor Graham pleaded not guilty to hindering a grand jury’s probe of performance-enhancing drugs in sports on Thursday, the same day Barry Bonds’s personal trainer was ordered back to prison.
